CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Equitable Holdings Inc is a financial services company in the US. The company provides variable annuities, tax-deferred investment and retirement plans, employee benefits, and protection solutions for individuals, families, and small businesses. Its business segments include Individual Retirement, Group Retirement, Investment Management, Research, and Protection Solutions. The Individual Retirement segment offers annuity products, the Group Retirement segment provides tax-deferred investment and retirement services, Investment Management and Research segment consist of diversified investment management, research, and related services, and the Protection Solutions segment focuses on life insurance products.

value.name: Jeffrey Joy Hurd
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Executive VP
